LanguageData.NY_TableCrafting.label: loong forgery
LanguageData.NY_TableCrafting.description: The workbench used by loongs to craft most things.\n\nEating on the forgery is prohibited! Don't cook with it either! And put the tools back to where the were!
LanguageData.NY_TableFurnace.label: loong stove
LanguageData.NY_TableFurnace.description: A wood-fueled stove. It was believed to be the crucial part of loong cuisine。
LanguageData.NY_TableWeaving.label: loong spinning wheel
LanguageData.NY_TableWeaving.description: An ancient prodution tool, enhanced to be capable of weaving cloth and sewing.
